thread.title: BRIEF-Michael Hill International Announces Brand Repositioning Of Emma & Roe And Plan for US Exit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Michael Hill International Announces Brand Repositioning Of Emma & Roe And Plan for US Exit

organizations.name: brief-michael hill international announces brand repositioning of emma & roe

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Michael Hill International Ltd:
* ANNOUNCES A SET OF STRATEGIC ACTIONS ACROSS ITS GLOBAL RETAIL NETWORK
* WILL CONTINUE TO HAVE IN EXCESS OF 300 STORES GLOBALLY ONCE THE US STORE CLOSURES ARE FINALISED
* US STORES WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE AS CO NEGOTIATES & COMPLETES EXIT OF ITS US OPERATIONS‍​
* NON-CASH WRITE-DOWNS OF EMMA & ROE STORE ASSETS ARE ESTIMATED TO BE A$7 MILLION‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
